mapper.select: select sr.resource_code from sys_role_resource sr left join sys_role r on r.role_id = sr.role_id where sr.role_id = #{roleId} AND r.status = 0
select r.resource_id from sys_resource r left join sys_role_resource rr on r.resource_code = rr.resource_code where rr.role_id = #{roleId}
mapper.sql: select resource_id, app_code, resource_code, resource_name, class_name, method_name, modular_name, url, http_method, resource_biz_type, required_permission_flag, create_time from sys_resource
